thread.section_title: Ampere Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location!
thread.title_full: Great location! - Review of Ampere Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: donnabY3843KI
title: Great location!
text: The hotel ampere is close to the metro and a convenient walk to restaurants and a wonderful market on Neil. Friendly and helpful staff all around and high quality toiletries in the bathroom and a wonderful shower. Bedding is comfortable and the room was quiet and very adequate for our 6 day stay. We would definitely return!
